title: How much would this account be worth?

embed.description: ThaCooLoser's League of Legends statistics. Discover how ThaCooLoser plays. Learn their best, their worst; all ThaCooLoser's stats history and game records!

body: With these skins, Platinum 5 account, almost all champions ( missing 6 champs)  I was just wondering how much would it be worth? Hextech Annie alone costs more than half of those other skins xD

replies.body:
It would be valued at **Priceless**.  Each unlock is a memory of a moment you've spent in game and the friends made along the way.  

That and because we don't support any form of account selling or trading.  Be super wary, as our fraud team will be quick to close down sales or attempted transactions without recovery.  Share moments on the rift, but not your accounts.  Hope that clears things up!

https://images1.whatuni.com/commimg/myhotcourses/blog-inline/myhc_14681.jpg

BUT, if you did ban his account for selling, wouldn't it still be a "win" for him, because he already sold the account and got the money and if you banned the account for trading wouldn't it suck JUST for the buyer?
this is the best support answer I've ever seen
